list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, narrow part or section forming the handle of a tool or club, the body of a spear or arrow, or a similar implement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the shaft of a golf club

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a ray of light or bolt of lightning.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một trục ánh sáng mặt trời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, narrow, typically vertical hole that gives access to a mine, accommodates an elevator in a building, or provides ventilation.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: brilliant sunshine shafted through the skylight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ánh nắng mặt trời rực rỡ xuyên qua giếng trời
